actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Pressler with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 104-233.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 335.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to relieve farmers and retail farm suppliers from limitations on maximum driving and on-duty time in the transportation of agricultural commodities or farm supplies if such transportation occurs within 100-air mile radius of the source of the commodities or the distribution point for the farm supplies.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to exempt farmers and retail farm suppliers transporting farm supplies for agricultural purposes from certain regulations on maximum driving and on-duty time for motor carrier drivers, if such transportation occurs within a 50-mile radius of the distribution point during the crop-planting and harvesting seasons.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to relieve farmers and retail farm suppliers from limitations on maximum driving and on-duty time in the transportation of agricultural commodities or farm supplies if such transportation occurs within 100-air mile radius of the source of the commodities or the distribution point for the farm supplies.
